引用的代码预览管理

if exists (select 1
from sys.sysreferences r join sys.sysobjects o on (o.id = r.constid and o.type = 'F')
where r.fkeyid = object_id('enterprise') and o.name = 'FK_ENTERPRI_MANAGEE_ADMIN')
alter table enterprise
drop constraint FK_ENTERPRI_MANAGEE_ADMIN
go

alter table enterprise
add constraint FK_ENTERPRI_MANAGEE_ADMIN foreign key (ano)
references admin (ano)
go
